game.name: Prevent The Fall
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Prevent the Fall is a Role Playing Game/Dungeon Crawler. Advance through 20 character levels, as you acquire items of power, and attempt to conquer dungeons which are a mixture of hand-crafted and generated content. Both VR and non-VR and single player or multiplayer coop are supported.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Prevent the Fall is a Role Playing Game/Dungeon Crawler. Advance through 20 character levels, as you acquire items of power, and attempt to conquer dungeons which are a mixture of hand-crafted and generated content. Both VR and non-VR and single player or multiplayer coop are supported.
